Posted: February 14
												This game is very very fun! Once you finish the first boss you have an entire world filled with dirtbikes, epic stunts, awesome crashes, amazing graphics, and the amazing power of sweet sweet nitro! I recommend this game to every person who loves dirt bikes and loves games filled with energetic racing! I very well do reccomend this game!

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: February 27
												I like it. It's a trick filled Trialslike game earning nitro boost as you do tricks. Be prepared to race each track multiple times to learn the track in order beat it and unlock the next race. Nice graphics, nice sounds, good competitive AI. Pure Arcade fun! Also compete against other players scores and ghosts, not live action, but still fun trying to move up in the rankings.Worth the full $20 price in my opinion.
